args.text: The best ways to learn a language abroad are living with native speakers, watching local TV shows, accepting invitations, keeping a vocabulary book, practicing grammar and verb drills, and consistently speaking the local language. Immersion in the local language is the most effective way to learn a foreign language while living abroad.
